document.full_text: herman cain, who made his fortune pitching soda, burgers and pizza before turning to politics late in life, declared himself a candidate saturday for something that few others seem to want these days: the republican nomination for president in 2012.
document.title: former pizza executive joins presidential race
lines_and_colors: herman cain, who made his fortune pitching soda, burgers and pizza before turning to politics late in life, declared himself a candidate saturday for something that few others seem to want these days: the republican nomination for president in 2012.
